mapper.update:
update fop_loan_product
companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaCode = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productName = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loanAmount = #{loanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rateType = #{rateType,jdbcType=CHAR},
loanRate = #{loanRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
loanType = #{loanType,jdbcType=CHAR},
loanYear = #{loanYear,jdbcType=CHAR},
repaymentType = #{repaymentType,jdbcType=CHAR},
suretyType = #{suretyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
releaseDate = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update fop_loan_product set companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaCode = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productName = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loanAmount = #{loanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rateType = #{rateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, loanRate = #{loanRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, loanType = #{loanType,jdbcType=CHAR}, loanYear = #{loanYear,jdbcType=CHAR}, repaymentType = #{repaymentType,jdbcType=CHAR}, suretyType = #{suretyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releaseDate = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from fop_loan_product where productName=#{productName}
mapper.sql: f.id, f.companyId, f.areaCode, f.productName, f.description, f.loanAmount, f.rateType, f.loanRate, f.loanType, f.loanYear, f.repaymentType, f.suretyType, f.remark,f.releaseDate, f.status, f.createUserId, f.createUserName, f.createDate, f.lastModifyUserId, f.lastModifyUserName, f.lastModifyDate, c.fullName as companyName,c.companyProperty,c.address
from fop_loan_product f left join fop_company c on f.companyId=c.id
